:::Ramjet/Vulois:::

Ramjet: yes, we have a base. It's in the place that will someday be called 
Syria.  It once belonged to another faction, and when we found it it was 
ruined.  But we fixed it up, and I'd be glad to show you it.  Would you like 
to see?
~~~~~
::Vulois nodded reluctantly::
Vulois: Although i'd prefer we didn't resort to violence, i know that you are 
just trying to keep the peace yourselves, and will assist you in any way i 
can.
::He fired a blast of energy at the dragon::

--part1_d7.5663d42.2811f1fe_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
